weekly picks (May 1 week 2025)

Posted on May 5, 2025 in 2025may,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2025 May 1st week collection

  1. s41467-025-59423-9 Uncovering the doping mechanism of nitric oxide in high-performance P-type WSe2 transistors (Nature Communications)

  2. s42005-025-02117-x Observation of time crystal in a spin maser system (Communications Physics)

  3. PhysRevLett.134.180801 Genuine Quantum Non-Gaussianity and Metrological Sensitivity of Fock States Prepared in a Mechanical Resonator (PRL)

  4. PhysRevLett.134.183401 In Situ Imaging of the Thermal de Broglie Wavelength in an Ultracold Bose Gas (PRL)

  5. PhysRevLett.134.183402 Measuring Pair Correlations in Bose and Fermi Gases via Atom-Resolved Microscopy (PRL)

  6. PhysRevLett.134.183403 Quantum Gas Microscopy of Fermions in the Continuum (PRL)

  7. PhysRevLett.134.188001 Controlling Molecular Dynamics by Exciting Atoms in a Cavity (PRL)

  8. PhysRevX.15.021039 Coherent Phonons and Quasiparticle Renormalization in Semimetals from First Principles (PRX)

  9. PhysRevX.15.021040 Realistic Ab Initio Predictions of Excimer Behavior under Collective Light-Matter Strong Coupling (PRX)

  10. PhysRevResearch.7.023114 Stronger femtosecond excitation causes slower electron-phonon coupling in silicon (PRR)

  11. PhysRevResearch.7.023116 Computing canonical averages with quantum and classical optimizers: Thermodynamic reweighting for QUBO models of physical systems (PRR)

  12. PhysRevResearch.7.023117 Proposed optomechanical systems based on luminescence-induced optical forces (PRR)

  13. PhysRevResearch.7.023118 Fully plasma-based electron injector for a linear collider or XFEL (PRR)

  19. 2505.00845v1 Quantum Monte Carlo assessment of embedding for a strongly-correlated defect: interplay between mean-field and interactions (arXiv)

  21. 2505.00959v1 Current-induced Dynamics of Bloch Domain-wall Bimerons (arXiv)

  22. 2505.00964v1 Non-Hermitian Haldane-Hubbard model: Effective description of an open system with balanced gain and loss (arXiv)

  23. 2505.00971v1 Bulk excitations in ultraclean alpha-RuCl3: Quantitative evidence for Majorana dispersions in a Kitaev quantum spin liquid (arXiv)

  30. 2505.01330v1 Specular-Andreev reflection and Andreev interference in an Ising superconductor junction (arXiv)

  31. 2505.01334v1 Direct evidence for two-gap superconductivity in hydrogen-intercalated titanium diselenide (arXiv)
